response: Welcome to the Ola Scooter family, featuring the S1 and S1 Air families. The S1 family offers the best design, technology, and performance with a powerful 8.5 kW motor. It includes the OLA S1 Pro, OLA S1, and OA S1, each with different battery capacities. The S1A family offers great design and technology at a more affordable price. We're introducing the new S1 scooter with a 2 kilowatt-hour battery pack, perfect for daily city commutes. The S1 Air family offers three variants with unique features and specifications. Choose the one that suits your needs and budget. Booking starts from 9th February with deliveries beginning in March 2023.
title: L1.1.6 OLA Scooters Family.mp4
